TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyValueEditor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Establishes an inline editor for the updating of property values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class can hold a single <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>: one for an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> editor. Inline editing refers to the entering of property values into a text box or similar control as opposed to setting the value by choosing it from a drop-down menu.
## Examples [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks This <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> has its <xref:System.Windows.DataContext> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
